sentences.en: Aliphatic hydrocarbons can be nitrated even with 13 % nitric acid.
sentences.cn: 脂肪酸甚至能被13%的硝酸硝化.

sentences.en: Also free from nitric acid and phosphoric acid, to prevent algae breeding.
sentences.cn: 更不含硝酸及磷酸, 真正预防藻类滋生.

sentences.en: Main products of the Joint Chemical concentrated nitric acid and ammonium nitrate.
sentences.cn: 联合化工主营产品为浓硝酸和硝酸铵.

sentences.en: Nitracidium and hydronitracidium nitrastes are present in concentrated nitric acid.
sentences.cn: 浓硝酸中有硝酸合氢和氢合硝酸合氢的硝酸盐存在.

sentences.en: Nitric acid forms hydrates with water.
Nitric acid molecules are linked by hydrogen bonds.
sentences.cn: 硝酸分子以氢键互相连结.

sentences.en: Phenols and anilides can be nitrated with very dilute nitric acid.
sentences.cn: 酚类和酰基苯胺能被极稀的硝酸硝化.

sentences.en: Recently the reactivity of nitric esters in the presence of hydrazine has been investigated.
sentences.cn: 人们近来研究了有肼存在时硝酸酯的反应性.

sentences.en: Satellite mapping of rain - induced nitric oxide emissions from soils.
sentences.cn: 根据土壤由于雨引起的氮氧化物排放的卫星图片.

sentences.en: Silver azide does not dissolve in water or in nitric acid.
sentences.cn: 叠氨化银不溶于水或硝酸.

sentences.en: The detector tube is filled with nitric oxide.
sentences.cn: 检测管中充满了氧化氮.

sentences.en: The stuff was like nitric acid.
Under the pathology conditions, excessive nitric oxide can induce nerve injury.
sentences.cn: 在病理条件下, 过量的一氧化氮可引起神经损伤.

sentences.en: When nitric acid is poured on copper, a brown vapor gives off.
sentences.cn: 将硝酸倒在铜上, 会散发出一种棕色的蒸气.

trans.tran_cn: （尤指在五价状态下）氮的，含氮的
trans.tran_en: Nitric means relating to or containing nitrogen
